quotes.english: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.korean: 훌륭한 일을 하는 유일한 방법은 자신이 하는 일을 사랑하는 것이다.
quotes.spanish: La única manera de hacer un gran trabajo es amar lo que haces.
quotes.portuguese: A única maneira de fazer um ótimo trabalho é amar o que você faz.
quotes.hindi: महान काम करने का एकमात्र तरीका यह है कि आप जो करते हैं उससे प्यार करें।
quotes.indonesian: Satu-satunya cara untuk melakukan pekerjaan hebat adalah mencintai apa yang Anda lakukan.
quotes.japanese: 素晴らしい仕事をする唯一の方法は、自分がしていることを愛することです。
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.english: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.korean: 인생은 당신이 다른 계획을 세우느라 바쁜 동안 일어나는 것이다.
quotes.spanish: La vida es lo que te pasa mientras estás ocupado haciendo otros planes.
quotes.portuguese: A vida é o que acontece com você enquanto você está ocupado fazendo outros planos.
quotes.hindi: जीवन वह है जो आपके साथ तब होता है जब आप अन्य योजनाएं बनाने में व्यस्त होते हैं।
quotes.indonesian: Hidup adalah apa yang terjadi pada Anda saat Anda sibuk membuat rencana lain.
quotes.japanese: 人生とは、あなたが他の計画を立てるのに忙しい間に起こることです。
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.english: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.korean: 미래는 자신의 꿈의 아름다움을 믿는 사람들에게 속한다.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.spanish: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.portuguese: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.hindi: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.indonesian: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.japanese: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

quotes.english: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.korean: 가장 어두운 순간에 우리는 빛을 보기 위해 집중해야 한다.
quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.spanish: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.portuguese: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.hindi: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.indonesian: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.japanese: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

quotes.english: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.korean: 성공은 최종이 아니고, 실패는 치명적이지 않다. 계속하는 용기가 중요하다.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.spanish: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.portuguese: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.hindi: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.indonesian: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.japanese: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.english: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.korean: 시작하는 방법은 말을 멈추고 행동을 시작하는 것이다.
quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.spanish: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.portuguese: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.hindi: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.indonesian: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.japanese: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quotes.english: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.korean: 훌륭한 것을 위해 좋은 것을 포기하는 것을 두려워하지 마라.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
quotes.spanish: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.portuguese: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.hindi: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.indonesian: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quotes.english: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.korean: 혁신은 리더와 추종자를 구분한다.

quotes.spanish: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.portuguese: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.hindi: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.indonesian: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.japanese: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.english: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.korean: 불가능한 여행은 당신이 절대 시작하지 않는 여행이다.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins
quotes.spanish: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.portuguese: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.hindi: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.indonesian: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.japanese: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

quotes.english: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.korean: 당신의 시간은 제한되어 있다. 다른 사람의 인생을 살며 낭비하지 마라.
